newsitem.title: USA: Liberty Property completes $70 mln deal.
newsitem.headline: Liberty Property completes $70 mln deal.

text.p: Liberty Property Trust said on Monday it had completed the previously announced acquisition of 18 properties in a portfolio valued at $70 million.
Taken together, the properties consist of one million square feet of distribution, flex, and office space in South Carolina's three largest markets, Liberty said in a statement.
The portfolio also includes more than 260,000 square feet in five flex buildings in Tampa, Florida, and one 40,000-square-foot flex building in Charlotte, North Carolina.

"This year, Liberty has completed portfolio transactions which have allowed us to enter two target markets, South Carolina and Minneapolis, with a strong presence," said Liberty chief executive Willard Rouse III.
Liberty Property Trust is a self-administered real estate investment trust.
